title: Ongoing Garden Maintenance
subtitle: A regular maintenance routine in Grampound, Cornwall — keeping the garden tidy, healthy, and enjoyable with consistent visits and a clean finish every time.

seo.title: Ongoing Garden Maintenance in Grampound, Cornwall
seo.description: See how regular garden maintenance visits in Grampound, Cornwall keep this outdoor space tidy, healthy, and easy to enjoy — from general tidy-ups to ongoing upkeep.
seo.ogDescription: A garden kept looking its best with consistent maintenance — tidier beds, a cleaner overall look, and less work for the homeowner.

hero.imageAlt: Image of a clean well kept garden

overview.label: Project overview
paragraphs: This Grampound garden needed reliable ongoing maintenance to keep it tidy and manageable throughout the year.
We focus on consistent upkeep — clearing debris, keeping growth under control, and leaving the space looking clean and cared for after every visit.
Regular maintenance prevents small issues becoming big ones, helping the garden stay enjoyable, presentable, and easier to manage long-term.

whatWeDid.label: What we did
bullets: General tidy-up to remove debris and refresh the space
Weeding and clearing to keep beds and borders under control
Light pruning/shaping where needed to maintain a neat look
Final clean-down and leaving paths/areas looking tidy

result.label: The result
bullets: A noticeably tidier garden that looks cared for
Less overwhelm for the homeowner thanks to regular upkeep
A cleaner overall look around the shed and key areas
A garden that stays manageable and enjoyable year-round

gallery.caption: Before: the garden area around the shed needed a tidy-up and ongoing care.
After: a cleaner, tidier space with improved presentation and usability.
Ongoing: regular visits keep the garden looking neat and well maintained.

faq.question: How often do you offer garden maintenance visits?
faq.answer: We can tailor a schedule to your garden and your goals — common options are weekly, fortnightly, or monthly. We’ll recommend what makes sense after a quick look at the space.

faq.question: What’s included in ongoing garden maintenance?
faq.answer: Maintenance typically includes general tidy-ups, weeding, light pruning, and keeping the garden looking neat. If you need specific jobs (hedges, clearance, planting, mulching), we can add those as needed.

faq.question: Do you remove garden waste?
faq.answer: Yes — we can remove green waste and leave everything tidy. If you have a green-waste bin or compost and prefer we use that, just let us know.

faq.question: Can I book a one-off tidy-up first?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Many clients start with a one-off clear-up, then move onto a regular maintenance plan once the garden is back under control.
